answers.answer: You should definitely tell your doctor..I just now hit 9 pounds and I'm 29 weeks.Although you may gain most of it in your first to second trimester.Just drink a lot of water!
I'd let your dr know. Probably fluid retention.

I gained weight fast as well, it slowed down, a lot, in my third trimester.... My doctor just knew I was going to have gestational diabetes because I went over the expected weight gain, but I don't....
Could just be your body holding water as long as your eating healthy and exercising youll be fine I've gained about 6-7 lbs but I'm 32 weeks

question: Im 8 weeks and 2 days and ive already gained 8-9lbs!! I haven't changed my eating habits at all and morning sickness has been kickin my a** for the past 3 weeks. Does anybody else have this problem or know what,is causing me to gain so quickly?
title: weight gain?!?
